burst.msg_body: Multiple burst reads of variable length and bit width 32 in loop 'Store_vertice_loop' has been inferred on bundle 'gmem0'. These burst requests might be further partitioned into multiple requests during RTL generation, based on max_read_burst_length or max_write_burst_length settings.
